mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS id, c.exam_no AS examNo, c.name AS name, c.major AS major, CASE WHEN s.candidate_id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS interviewLocked FROM admissions_candidate c LEFT JOIN admissions_interview_score s ON s.candidate_id = c.id ORDER BY c.id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
